casebody.data:
REID
v.
JULIUS BLUM, INC. No. 170P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 29, 2006. Renee Hughes, Charlotte, for Julius Blum, Inc.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th day of May 2006 by Plaintiff for "Petition for Rehearing":

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 29th day of June 2006."
